aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Democratizing access to professional-grade financial data and analysis for investors of all levels.
aboutPage.storyP1: Founded in 2020, INVESTOPATRONUS emerged from a simple observation: individual investors deserve the same quality of financial data and analysis that institutional investors enjoy.
aboutPage.storyP2: Our team of experienced financial analysts, data scientists, and software engineers work together to bring you real-time market data, comprehensive analysis, and educational resources.
aboutPage.storyP3: Today, we serve thousands of investors worldwide, helping them navigate the complex world of financial markets with confidence.
aboutPage.valuesSubtitle: These core values guide everything we do at INVESTOPATRONUS.
aboutPage.valueAccuracyDesc: We are committed to providing the most accurate and timely financial data to help you make informed decisions.
aboutPage.valueCommunityDesc: Our platform is built by investors, for investors. We listen to our community and continuously improve.
aboutPage.valueExcellenceDesc: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from our analysis to our user experience.
aboutPage.valueGlobalDesc: We cover markets worldwide, providing you with a comprehensive view of the global financial landscape.

advertisePage.heroSubtitle: Connect your brand with our highly engaged audience of investors, traders, and financial professionals.
advertisePage.solutionsSubtitle: Choose from our range of advertising options to meet your marketing objectives.
advertisePage.formatDisplayDesc: Premium banner placements across our platform with various sizes and formats.
advertisePage.formatSponsoredDesc: Native articles and research reports that integrate naturally with our content.
advertisePage.formatNewsletterDesc: Reach our engaged email audience with dedicated or featured placements.
advertisePage.formatCustomDesc: Tailored advertising solutions designed for your specific marketing goals.
advertisePage.audienceSubtitle: Our readers are financially sophisticated individuals actively managing their investments.
advertisePage.ctaSubtitle: Download our comprehensive media kit or speak with our advertising team.

contactPage.heroSubtitle: Have questions or feedback? We would love to hear from you. Our team is here to help.
contactPage.techSupportDesc: Found a bug or technical issue? Let us know.
contactPage.toastSuccess: Message sent successfully! We will get back to you soon.
contactPage.toastError: Failed to send message. Please try again.

cookieBanner.title: We use cookies
cookieBanner.body: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. You can customize your preferences or learn more in our Privacy Policy.
cookieBanner.dialogDescription: Manage your cookie preferences. You can enable or disable different types of cookies below.
cookieBanner.essentialDescription: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
cookieBanner.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
cookieBanner.preferencesDescription: Remember your settings and preferences for a better experience.
